definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: There're many differences between Vietnamese and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民在許多方面是不同的對越南語。

sentences.english: This brings us finally to Vietnam and Cambodia.
sentences.chinese: 這一段將最終把我們的視線帶往越南語柬埔寨。

sentences.english: Sometimes associated with Vietnamese and called CJKV.
What is the percentage of your Vietnamese speaking customers?
sentences.chinese: 貴公司之顧客有多少會講越南語？

sentences.english: He hasn't learned Vietnamese, so he couldn't recognize it.
sentences.chinese: 他沒學過越南語，所以不認識南字。

sentences.english: There are Chinese characters found in Korean and Vietnamese.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮語越南語之中也同樣有漢字的身影。

sentences.english: Packaging material for the finished product including a Vietnamese language insert leaflet.
sentences.chinese: 包裝成品包括越南語插入單張材料。

sentences.english: Butit is more than that, it is the true secrets of the Necronomicon.
sentences.chinese: 但現在比，那就是真正機密的越南語。

definition: Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)

(Tw) (slang) a prank, prevalent in Chinese schools and known as "happy corner" in Hong Kong, in which several people carry a victim with his legs spread open, bringing his groin up against a pole or tree trunk
Aruba, island in the Caribbean, a self-governing part of the Netherlands
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
reading or phonetic value of a character
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
When you enter a village, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
Cantonese romanization/Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems
Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
